channel.title: Please help with this, cannot load main class
channel.description:
I've been trying to figure this out for hours,days not sure whats going on with it the client/source im using is project-exile ill give u guys a pic of what error is occurring. Please if you know anything about how to fix this problem post it as in pics or explain. also ill show u what I have in my environmental variables.
Top part / Bottom part is same way. CLASSPATH:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.8.0_11\bin PATH:C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.8.0_11\bin
Also ill give you a pic of what the run file is.

item.title: Please help with this, cannot load main class
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

ohokay:

You need the class files, which you get from compiling. It doesn’t look as if you have any class files in that directory.

Oh okay thanks, its fine. I’m just changing sources/client do you know how people can just get into my rsps without having to manually put in the cache also how i can auto update my rsps without making people redownload the rsps again and again?

Read full topic
item.source: Please help with this, cannot load main class
